mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(member_id, nickname, login_id, password, role) VALUES (MEMBER_SEQ.nextval, #{nickname}, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS memberId, town_id AS townId, nickname, password, role FROM member WHERE login_id = #{loginId} AND delete_date IS NULL
SELECT town_id FROM town WHERE town_code = #{townCode} AND delete_date IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_investment(type_id, average, amount, member_id) VALUES (#{typeId}, 0, 0, #{memberId})
INSERT INTO account (account_id, trade_date, moa, type, member_id) VALUES (ACCOUNT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, DEFAULT, 50, 0, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT balance FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND delete_date IS NULL

SELECT TO_CHAR(profile) profile, nickname, balance, CASE WHEN member_id = #{currentUserId} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS isCurrentUser FROM member WHERE town_id = #{townId} AND delete_date IS NULL ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT j.name, j.description, j.pay FROM job_request jr JOIN job j ON jr.job_id = j.job_id WHERE jr.member_id = #{memberId} AND jr.allowYN = 'Y' FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT t.name, t.description, t.total_members AS totalMembers, t.total_tax AS totalTax FROM member m JOIN town t ON m.town_id = t.town_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}
